class.name: Debug
class.description: Contains useful methods for debugging, tracing and profiling.

class.name: Session
class.description: This is a wrapper class for all Session activity.

class.name: Token
class.description: Token class provides helpful functionality for token generation

class.name: Validation
class.description: The validation class contains methods for validating all kinds of data including regex patterns.

class.name: Admin
class.description: The main controller for site administration and management requests.

class.name: Api
class.description: This controller handles all web service requests and provides an extensive and robust api.

class.name: Home
class.description: The default site controller. All requests will

class.name: Controller
class.description: The base Controller class. It processes and responds to events such as user actions and it invokes changes to the model and the view based on those events.

class.name: Database
class.description: The database wrapper class. It contains methods to quickly perform database operations. It also acts as a layer of security using its sanitization methods to ensure that data is properly escaped before storage and data being extracted is appropriately unescaped.

class.name: Audio
class.description: Audio model class. Handles all logic and persistent storage for media/audio post types.

class.name: Element
class.description: The Element class represents an object of a Page. This class describes methods and properties common to all kinds of elements. Specific behaviors are described in classes which inherit from Element but add additional functionality.

class.name: Image
class.description: Image model class. Handles all logic and persistent storage for media/image post types.

interface.name: iNode
interface.description: The base class for all web elements.

class.name: Layout
class.description: This class provides a structured representation of all Posts that are of the type Layout. It defines methods that allow access to these posts, so they can change the Layout document structure, style and and content of the resultant coresponding HTML document views.

class.name: Page
class.description: This class provides a structured representation of all Posts that are of the type Page. It defines methods that allow access to these posts, so they can change the Page document structure, style and and content of the resultant coresponding HTML document views.

class.name: Post
class.description: The base class of all post model. Handles business logic and abstracts the persistent storage classe(s) and models.
